name: Shatter Bomb
description:
a classic bubble trouble type game

shoot the bomb to get rid of it!

but be carefull: this bomb shatters into pieces when it explodes, so try to detonate them one by one!

Controls

move:

WASD    or    arrow keys

shoot:

SPACE    or    left mouse button
